attributes.action: Make you proud to be in charge, does it?
attributes.additional_details:
'Football team murdered schoolboy Rhys Jones played for is disbanded after opponents threatened to SHOOT players'

Headlines like this will be the legacy of your 'Big Society' and 'we're all in this together' statements.  Both ludicrous and proving to be so untrue but ENTIRELY indicative of what sort of country YOU have produced out of your 'keep the truth away from the people at all costs' style of mismanagement of this once great country.
